<br>
Homicides over the last 12 months are trending <h8>`r ifelse(murders_city$inc_21tolast12>=0," up"," down")` `r ifelse(murders_city$inc_21tolast12>=0,murders_city$inc_21tolast12,substring(murders_city$inc_21tolast12,2))`%</h8> compared to 2021.

However, the murder rate over the last 12 months is<h8>`r ifelse(murders_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12>=0," up"," down")` `r ifelse(murders_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12>=0,murders_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12,substring(murders_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12,2))`%</h8> compared to the annual average over the last three years, and the frequency of killings remains higher than it was before the pandemic.

The city averaged <h8>`r round(murders_city$last12mos/52,0)`</h8> homicides a week over the last 12 months. In 2019, that number was <h8>`r round(murders_city$total19/52,0)`</h8> a week.

One way to think about the danger: three years ago, the murder rate was <h8>`r murders_city$rate19`</h8> per 100,000 residents. That's slightly less than risk as dying in a vehicle crash in Texas.

During the pandemic, a person's chance of being murdered in Houston rose above the likelihood of dying in a vehicle crash.

<br>

The risk is not the same neighborhood to neighborhood.

ABC13's data team looked at the Houston Police Department's data by neighborhood from 2019 through `r format(asofdate, "%B %d")`.

<subhead>A closer look at Houston homicides by neighborhood</subhead>

The map color-codes each neighborhood by the homicide rate over the last 12 months. The three darker blues highlight neighborhoods where the murder rate is higher than the citywide rate.

You can click any neighborhood to see detailed numbers or the buttons at the bottom of the map to switch between numbers and rates. You can search for a street, place, landmark or zip code to zoom to that location.

<br>

# Creating police beats map for types of crimes
houston_murder_map <- leaflet(murders_beat, options = leafletOptions(zoomControl = FALSE, zoomSnap = 0.5, zoomDelta=0.5)) %>%
  htmlwidgets::onRender("function(el, x) {
L.control.zoom({ position: 'topright' }).addTo(this)
}") %>%
  setView(-95.45, 29.75, zoom = 11) %>% 
  addProviderTiles(provider = "CartoDB.Positron") %>%
  addPolygons(color = "white", 
              popup = murderlabel,
              popupOptions = popupOptions(maxWidth ="200", 
                                          minWidth ="200"),
              weight = 2, 
              smoothFactor = 0.5,
              opacity = 0.6, 
              fillOpacity = 0.6,
              fillColor = ~murderpal1(rate_last12),
              group="Rate") %>% 
    addPolygons(color = "white", 
              popup = murderlabel,
              popupOptions = popupOptions(maxWidth ="200", 
                                          minWidth ="200"),
              weight = 2, 
              smoothFactor = 0.5,
              opacity = 0.6, 
              fillOpacity = 0.6,
              fillColor = ~murderpal2(last12mos),
              group="Number") %>% 
  addSearchOSM(options = searchOptions(autoCollapse=FALSE, minLength = 3,zoom=13, position="topleft")) %>%
    onRender("function(el, x) {
        $('input.search-input')[0].placeholder = 'Search street, place or zip code'
        }") %>%
  addLegend(opacity = 0.6,
            values = murders_beat$rate_last12, 
            pal = murderpal1,
            position = "bottomleft", 
            title = paste(sep="","<popuptitle>Murder Rate<br><popupchatter>Murders/100K people<br>Citywide: ",murders_city$rate_last12),
            group = "Rate",
            className = "info legend Rate") %>%
  addLegend(opacity = 0.6,
            values = murders_beat$last12mos, 
            pal = murderpal2,
            position = "bottomleft", 
            title = paste(sep="","<popuptitle>Murders<br><popupchatter>Total murders<br>Citywide: ",murders_city$last12mos),
            group = "Number",
            className = "info legend Number") %>%
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("Rate","Number"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE),
    position = 'bottomright') %>% hideGroup(c("Number")) %>%
   htmlwidgets::onRender("
      function(el, x) {
         var updateLegend = function () {
            var selectedGroup = document.querySelectorAll('input:checked')[0].nextSibling.innerText.substr(1);

            document.querySelectorAll('.legend').forEach(a => a.hidden=true);
            document.querySelectorAll('.legend').forEach(l => {
               if (l.classList.contains(selectedGroup)) l.hidden=false;
            });
         };
         updateLegend();
         this.on('baselayerchange', el => updateLegend());
      }"
   )
houston_murder_map
